10.text: -- last year auditors discovered arafat was guilty of skimming $ 2 million a month from the gasoline trade in the territories , time reports . in august 2002 international donors forced arafat to sign over his investments to the palestine investment fund , which was audited by u . s . accountants and managed by palestinian finance minister salam fayyad , a former international monetary fund official .

events.description: the trigger word discovered refers to the event of finding something unexpectedly or while looking for something else.
the trigger word skimming refers to the event of taking money dishonestly from a fund, and it indicates an economic crime.
the trigger word sign over refers to the event of formally transferring something to another person or entity.
the trigger word audited refers to the event of a formal inspection of an organization's or individual's accounts.
the trigger word forced refers to the event where someone is made to do something against their will.
the trigger word guilty refers to the event where someone is legally responsible for a crime
the trigger word sign refers to the event of giving formal consent to or agreement to (a document or proposal)
